general.user: What are the earnings, profit, profit margin of Express Kabel GmbH?
general.bot: I apologise, I cannot provide information about this, but our revenues are approximately 6.5 million Euros.
I apologise, I cannot provide information about our clients as this is confidential, but we can disclose that we deliver almost all OEMs.

general.user: Do you have any global Distribution Partners?
general.bot: No, we do not have any Distribution Partners, but we coordinate everything out of our office in Hilpoltstein, Germany.

general.user: Do you have a distribution partner in Asia?
general.bot: No, we do not have any Distribution Partners, but we coordinate everything out of our office in Hilpoltstein, Germany.
My name is Kablo, and I am the chatbot assistant for ExpressKabel GmbH.
I inform our customers about ExpressKabel GmbH and their products.
ExpressKabel itself is not ISO certified, however, all our suppliers have ISO certification.

product.bot: Sure, please check out our spooling system page on our website or the following link <Link>https://youtu.be/EdyvLlevux8</Link>.
We sell a wide variety of different cables, amongst them are High Voltage, Ethernet, Coaxial and FLRY cables.

product.user: I require automotive cables, do you have them?
product.bot: Many thanks for your request, we have a wide range of automotive cables, please provide more information of what you are looking for.

product.user: Which single-core cables do you offer?
product.bot: In stock we mainly provide FLRY Cables, but on request, we can also offer other single-core cables.

product.user: Do you also sell HDMI cables?
product.bot: No, we do not sell HDMI cables.

product.user: Can I also order custom cables from you?
product.bot: Yes, we also offer custom cables. Please contact us for a quote.

product.user: What colors do the cables come in?
product.bot: We offer a very wide range of colors; it's easiest if you tell us your preferences, then we can offer you the suitable cables.

product.user: Do you only have the items on your website in your portfolio?
product.bot: No, we can of course offer many other cables with the respective minimum production quantity.

product.user: Are the cables approved by OEMs?
product.bot: Yes, our cables are OEM approved.

product.user: What is the difference between conductor configuration A and B?
product.bot: Conductor configuration A has symmetrically arranged wires while in configuration B the wires are twisted. The wires are thinner, making the cable more flexible.

product.user: What is the difference between FLRY-A and FLRY-B?
product.bot: The difference is in the conductor configuration. Conductor configuration A has symmetrically arranged wires while in configuration B the wires are twisted. The wires are thinner, making the cable more flexible.

service.user: Can we have our purchased goods picked up by our own forwarding agent?
service.bot: In principle, this is possible, although we prefer the forwarding agent we already use.

service.user: Can I pick up my goods myself?
service.bot: Yes, you can pick up your goods yourself. Please note our pick-up times. Our adress is Daimlerstrasse 2a, 91161 Hilpoltstein, Germany

service.user: Can I pick up my goods during your opening hours?
service.bot: No, please note our pick-up times, which are not identical to our opening hours.

service.user: Why do you prefer your forwarding agent?
service.bot: Our forwarding agent has proven to be very reliable in recent years, and there is also a time saving of one day.
Yes, we also deliver abroad. Please note that delivery costs vary by country.

service.user: Which forwarding agent do you work with?
service.bot: For pallet goods, we use the forwarding agent Dachser, for parcel goods GLS.

service.user: Do you have cables in stock?
service.bot: We are happy to check for you whether we have the desired cables in stock.

service.user: How quickly can you ship the goods?
service.bot: We can generally ship in-stock items within one working day.
